body_html:
@asimshankar After putting both -ltensorflow_cc and -ltensorflow_framework after the source, I got some errors, but it is different and much shorter:

/usr/bin/ld: warning: libmklml_intel.so, needed by /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
/usr/bin/ld: warning: libiomp5.so, needed by /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to i_realloc' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLRNCreateForward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLRNCreateBackward_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to cblas_dgemm'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnBatchNormalizationCreateBackward_v2_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnPoolingCreateForward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to cblas_cgemm' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutGetMemorySize_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnExecute_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnBatchNormalizationCreateForward_v2_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to omp_in_parallel@VERSION' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutSerializationBufferSize_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to i_calloc' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to GOMP_barrier@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to omp_get_num_threads@VERSION' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConvolutionCreateBackwardFilter_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutCreateFromPrimitive_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to GOMP_parallel@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to MKL_Somatcopy' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnReLUCreateForward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConvolutionCreateBackwardData_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConcatCreate_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutDelete_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutDeserialize_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to cblas_zgemm' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnPoolingCreateBackward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConvolutionCreateForward_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to cblas_sgemm'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutCompare_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConvolutionCreateForwardBias_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConvolutionCreateBackwardBias_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConversionExecute_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to i_malloc' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to omp_get_max_threads@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to omp_get_thread_num@VERSION' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to i_free'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnDelete_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutCreate_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnLayoutSerialize_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnSumCreate_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnConversionCreate_F32' /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to dnnReLUCreateBackward_F32'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

Thanks.

/usr/bin/ld: warning: libmklml_intel.so, needed by /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)

body:
@asimshankar After putting both -ltensorflow_cc and -ltensorflow_framework after the source, I got some errors, but it is different and much shorter:

/usr/bin/ld: warning: libmklml_intel.so, needed by /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
/usr/bin/ld: warning: libiomp5.so, needed by /usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so, not found (try using -rpath or -rpath-link)
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to `i_realloc'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLRNCreateForward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLRNCreateBackward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `cblas_dgemm'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnBatchNormalizationCreateBackward_v2_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnPoolingCreateForward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `cblas_cgemm'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutGetMemorySize_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnExecute_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnBatchNormalizationCreateForward_v2_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `omp_in_parallel@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutSerializationBufferSize_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to `i_calloc'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `GOMP_barrier@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `omp_get_num_threads@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConvolutionCreateBackwardFilter_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutCreateFromPrimitive_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `GOMP_parallel@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `MKL_Somatcopy'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnReLUCreateForward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConvolutionCreateBackwardData_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConcatCreate_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutDelete_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutDeserialize_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `cblas_zgemm'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnPoolingCreateBackward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConvolutionCreateForward_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `cblas_sgemm'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutCompare_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConvolutionCreateForwardBias_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConvolutionCreateBackwardBias_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConversionExecute_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to `i_malloc'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `omp_get_max_threads@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `omp_get_thread_num@VERSION'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_framework.so: undefined reference to `i_free'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnDelete_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutCreate_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnLayoutSerialize_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnSumCreate_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnConversionCreate_F32'
/usr/local/lib/libtensorflow_cc.so: undefined reference to `dnnReLUCreateBackward_F32'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

Thanks.
